definition: to pilot a ship/to channel water/to draw water (for irrigation)

to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
lit. to lead the water through the wall/to ask for trouble (idiom)

sentences.english: Each one set of pilot ladder near port and starboard of the main deck shall be provided.
sentences.chinese: 主甲板的左右舷附近各安裝一個引水員軟梯。

sentences.english: Collapse treatment in section of Hongye-2 Hydroelectric Power Station headrace tunnel downstream of adit No.
sentences.chinese: 紅葉二級水電站引水隧洞2號支洞下游塌方段處理。

sentences.english: The water took ten days to reach Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 引水過了十天才到達北京。

sentences.english: Irrigated farming is the primary kind of agricultures in mess plateau.
sentences.chinese: 黃土高原自然條件特殊，耕作農業以引水灌溉爲主。

sentences.english: There is no cavitation damage and irrigation water and so on.
sentences.chinese: 不存在汽蝕破壞及灌引水等問題。

sentences.english: It can also be used in pumping station and diversion works with long pipes.
sentences.chinese: 本裝置也可以應用於長輸水管道抽水站及引水工程。

sentences.english: The water on the middle route is supposed to flow from the Danjiangkou Reservoir in Hubei.
sentences.chinese: 中線引水計劃從湖北省的丹江口水庫流出。

sentences.english: They try to conduct water uphill.
The Colosseum even may use the waterway pilot. A.
sentences.chinese: 鬥獸場甚至可以利用輸水道引水。

sentences.english: This article describes water-carriage system experiment of water quality purification in Yangzhou Slender West Lake.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了揚州瘦西湖水質治理中的引水系統試驗。

sentences.english: The ship signaled for a pilot.
sentences.chinese: 該船發出信號要求派引水員來。

sentences.english: The diversion of water to Beijing will add to the pressures.
sentences.chinese: 向北京引水更會增加許多壓力。

sentences.english: This is something all noble-minded persons are above doing.
sentences.chinese: 凡是有道德的人都不會幹這種引水禍鄰的勾當。

sentences.english: Thanks to a Gansu-wide water conservancy project carried out twenty years ago, the farmland around Li's village is connected to an irrigation system which draws from the Yellow River.
sentences.chinese: 當地政府二十年前推行水利工程，從黃河引水灌溉。

sentences.english: This project has run quite well since the completion of the project in 1992.
sentences.chinese: 該工程自1992年建成至今，引水排沙效果良好。

definition: to dig out/to excavate/to scoop out
water intake/to obtain water (from a well etc)
water source/water supply/headwaters of a river
